Key Match Events: Kawhi Leonard's return to the game after a 253-day absence and his performance with 12 points in 19 minutes
Post-Match Reflections: Kawhi Leonard expressed his relief at returning to play and the challenges of rehabilitation, while coach Ty Lue emphasized the importance of gradually increasing his playing time
Others: The game was played at the Intuit Dome in Los Angeles, and Leonard's return was met with a warm reception by the fans
